about_the_game:
Embark on an adventure in this vibrant 3D cartoon-style parkour game, where every step uncovers novelty and surprise. Players are not just running and jumping freely through a world bursting with color; they're also unleashing their creativity to build unique parkour paths. The game's heart lies in its innovative building mechanism—using props provided within the game, players brilliantly navigate through dangerous terrains, explore hidden sanctuaries, and enjoy thrilling leisure moments.

Game highlights:
Ultimate Creation: Build parkour trails as you wish, transforming wild ideas into real adventurous journeys.
Secret Path Exploration: Each level hides more than one path to the finish, encouraging players to explore every nook and cranny to discover all possibilities.
Treasure Hunter: Rare treasures hidden around the world await the bravest explorers, with each collected item rewarding the player's courage and wisdom.
Breathtaking Worlds: Each level is a captivating painting, from mysterious forests and dark caves to bustling cities and deserted ruins, each filled with surprises.
Character Charm: Players can customize their characters, choosing unique outfits and accessories to stand out in this wonderful world.

In this game, every jump is a test of strategy and creativity, and every turn may reveal a new surprise. Players will laugh and journey through strange worlds, compete with players from around the globe, share their creativity, and explore this parkour land filled with limitless possibilities together. This is not just a game; it's a grand festival celebrating courage, wisdom, and creativity. Now, let us embark on this journey of infinite possibilities!

name: The Way of Cooking

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

publishers: 大连酷码星数字科技有限公司
short_description: Dive into a colorful 3D cartoon parkour game where each leap and step brings adventure. As runners, creators, and explorers, players have the freedom to design their own paths. The "free-build" mechanism transforms individual creations into adventures, blending creativity with exploration.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
